data.eml:eml: On the identity of Clistocoeloma balansae A. Milne-Edwards, 1873, and C. tectum (Rathbun, 1914), with description of a new species from the West Pacific (Crustacea: Decapoda: Sesarmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, B. Y., Ng, N. K., Ng, L. (2013): On the identity of Clistocoeloma balansae A. Milne-Edwards, 1873, and C. tectum (Rathbun, 1914), with description of a new species from the West Pacific (Crustacea: Decapoda: Sesarmidae). Zootaxa 3641 (4): 420-432, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3641.4.8
